These \w were|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H7967"\w* \w gatekeepers|strong="H7778"\w*: \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*, \w Akkub|strong="H6126"\w*, \w Talmon|strong="H2929"\w*, Ahiman, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* their relatives. \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* \w was|strong="H7218"\w* their \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*;
